title: Freaky Friday: Episode 12
description:
Hospital ghosts, cats with a mob connection, a lady(?) with a bag, haunted apartments, a murderous twist after a happily ever after, and light as a feather stiff as a board.

If you have an odd but true story you would like to submit for Freaky Friday, please do so here
